title: Junie Translator Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Junie Translator project

from-language.description: Source language for translation. Use 'auto' for automatic detection.

api-service-provider.description: AI service provider to use. Use 'auto' to auto-detect based on available API keys.

api-key.description: API key for the AI service. If null, will try to get from environment variables.

output-directory.description: Directory for output files. If null, will use the same directory as the input file.

model.description: Model to use for translation. If null, will use service-specific defaults.

prompt-style.description: Style of prompts to use from prompts.json.
